actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A joint resolution requiring the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to commence a rulemaking relating to natural gas pipeline rate designs, and to report its findings, conclusions and recommendations.

summary.text: Directs the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to commence a rulemaking relating to natural gas pipeline rate designs and to report its findings, conclusions, and recommendations to the President and the appropriate congressional committees.

titles.title: A joint resolution requiring the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to commence a rulemaking relating to natural gas pipeline rate designs, and to report its findings, conclusions and recommendations.
